boardgame.name: Helvetia
boardgame.description: The cover and name might have you thinking trivia game, but Matthias Cramer has something else in mind for you in Helvetia._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You and your fellow players run small but busy mountain villages in the Swiss Alps where you work, build and trade. But life isn't only about work. Your village baker longs for a partner, and the farmer's son has his eye on the dashing woodcutter in the neighboring village._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;So let the wedding bells ring and marry off that farmer's son in the village of another player, thereby earning you additional income. And surely your village baker will find a woman from a neighboring village to move in with him. Before you know it, their offspring will be new citizens in your village._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your goal in Helvetia is to build new homes, bring culture to your village, and sell essential goods at market. Whatever strategy you choose, this village life won't be boring _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; especially in the villages that grow and thrive!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2012 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: German version from Kosmos.

Played just once. Shipping is: without shipping insurance: 4,50 EUR to Germany,10 EUR to EU and 15 EUR worldwide including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,18 EUR to EU, 35 EUR to Europe, U.S. and Canada and 42 EUR worldwide
German Kosmos edition. Components are language independent. Game just played once. Everything there in great shape.

Brand new in shrink wrap. I will ship immediately and will ship worldwide. Aaah, the Swiss Alps, take in the fresh air, hear the ringing of cow bells on the pastures, smell the fresh bread being baked and taste the freshest milk, cheese and chocolate. Make your village thrive, learn the trades, meet the prettiest girl from the village next door and.... YOOODLEEY-HEEE-HOOOO!!!!! Fantastic game that will take you to Switzerland and not make you want to come back! DISCOUNT OFFER _____________________________________________ If you buy THIS game and pick ANOTHER game from my marketplace, I will take $2 off THIS game AND $2 off the other game. On additional games I will take another $1 off for each game. PLUS you will get combined shipping!! ____________________________________________________________ My Marketplace and some hard to find games: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekstore.php3?action=viewuser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;username=greengow Age of Napoleon Altamira Die Burgen von Burgund Era of Inventions Hornet Keltis: Das Kartenspiel King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Vineyard Liberte Quebec 1759 San Francisco Stephensons Rocket Terra Turrium Union Pacific Venedig

I´m offering from the SPIEL11 in Essen the exclusiv Helvetia Promo called: Wandarbeiter aus Österreich_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. The rules in german language but the Expansion is language independent. You can only use it with the base game. It´s new and unused. Bezahlung / Payment: - Deutschland: Überweisung - EU: euro bank transfer with IBAN and BIC (prefered) or paypal - Worldwide: PayPal -------------------------- Versandkosten / Shipping costs: - Deutschland: Bitte vorher erfragen. - EU:Please ask before buying. - Worldwide: please ask before buying.

It is new and unplayed. -------------------------- Bezahlung / Payment: - Deutschland: Überweisung - EU: euro bank transfer with IBAN and BIC or PayPal. - Rest of the world: PayPal -------------------------- Versandkosten / Shipping costs: - Deutschland: Bitte vorher anfragen. - EU:Please ask before buying. - Rest of the world: please ask before buying.

Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
